item.title: How to get FinOps Azure storage blob connection string
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Retrieve Azure storage connection strings in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations using X++ CloudInfrastructure class. Essential for integrations, file operations, and understanding cloud storage architecture.

item.title: Date time function Dynamics 365 Finance Operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Essential X++ date and time functions for Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations development. Code snippets for string conversion, date comparisons, and time zone handling.

item.title: Create Purchase Orders - Confirm - Product receipt - Post using X++ in Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete X++ code example for automating purchase order lifecycle in D365 Finance Operations including creation, confirmation, receipt, and posting processes.

item.title: Exception Handling in Dynamics 365 For Finance and Operation
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive guide to exception handling in Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations using X++ including try-catch blocks, optimistic concurrency exceptions, UpdateConflict, deadlock handling, and best practices.

item.title: Understanding modifiedField() Table method in Dynamics 365 Finance Operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to use the modifiedField() table method in D365 Finance Operations to handle field change events, with practical X++ code examples and best practices.
